oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Charcoal sketch of Benjamin Temple Elliott, Jr.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Family history notes that Benjamin Temple Elliott, Jr. served as a colonel in the Confederate army during the Civil War, but there is no record of his service as such. He was a farmer, and briefly a hotel keeper, who married Pauline Anne North in 1848.; They had nine children and are buried in Frankfurt, Ky.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Temple Elliott, Jr., Benjamin
